name: Liege Universal Exhibition 1905
obverse: Bust of Gustave Francotte facing left.
reverse: A man and a woman work in an armory. The woman is seated and cleaning a gun. The man is standing and examining a gun. Through the window is a view of the city. The coat of arms of the city can be seen on the wall to the left of the window.
description: This medal was made to commemorate the Universal Exhibition held in Liege, Belgium in 1905.
